dc:title: Real Revolutionists
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the plight of farmers' facing eviction, and how they united to fight through legislative process. Contends that the farmers are the true radicals, common people gathering together to keep each other afloat.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 40 1933-01-11 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
